definitions.definition: The repetition of consonant sounds or letters at the beginning of two or more words immediately succeeding each other, or at short intervals; such repetition specifically involving stressed syllables .
The recurrence of the same letters or sounds in accented parts of words, as in Anglo-Saxon alliterative meter.

main_definition: The repetition of consonant sounds or letters at the beginning of two or more words immediately succeeding each other, or at short intervals; such repetition specifically involving stressed syllables .
secondary_definitions: The recurrence of the same letters or sounds in accented parts of words, as in Anglo-Saxon alliterative meter.
